short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a button to password fields to quickly generate secure passwords with one click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
One Click Password takes the work out of sign up forms by automatically generating a secure, complex password and inputting it into password fields. 

Passwords are randomly generated using mixed-case alphanumeric strings and special characters, ensuring every password satisfies even the most demanding of password strength requirements.

USAGE:
------------
To use, simply click the green key button to the right of any password field, or right click and select "Generate password" from the context menu. You can optionally configure the length of generated passwords in the settings menu (default=20).
